pullRequest.title: #18064 fix to support temporal file id on the binary field to discove…
pullRequest.bodyText:
The mechanism to auto discovery the dotAsset content type was successfully able to work with a file sent as part of the multipart body.
However, when the binary field was sent as part of the body as a temporal file id it was not working.
The fix allows the mechanism to support also this variant

commit.message: #18064 fix to support temporal file id on the binary field to discover the mime type
#18064 setting the Site or Folder required in order to select the current host
#18064 the site or folder must be not required
